page.title: 18OUR GOOD SCHOOLS
page.content: OUR GOOD SCHOOLS IN EAST KILBRIDE. This is a page about the education system in Scotland. You might go to a nursery school from 3-5 years of age then go on to a primary school. You spend seven years there and then go up to high school. The earliest you can leave high school is at the age of l6 but some people stay for 6 years. Most of the schools in East Kilbride are fairly new and well kept. The grass is cut regularly and smashed windows are replaced quite quickly. Recently teachers have been taking action(including strikes) because they want to have their salaries reviewed. There are 3 nursery, 20 primary and 6 high schools in East Kilbride. The primaries in our area are Blacklaw, Halfmerke,Hunter,Long Calderwood, Maxwellton,St.Hilary's,St.Leonard's.
